title: $2,874 / 2br - 829ft2 -401 Derby!!! 2b1b In the heart of Jingle Town!
posting_body: *pictures and video are not of exact unit*
Communal outdoor seating area with grill
41 brand new upscale apartments in Oakland's vibrant Jingletown neighborhood.
Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 3030 Chapman, is just across from Alameda and a block from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood.
It's one of the fastest-growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area.
3030 Chapman offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers.
Many units have views of the water or private balconies.
Jingletown is very walkable and bikeable.
The Fruitvale BART station is less than a 10-minute walk so you can be in San Francisco in less than 30 minutes.
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
